preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 150 g of aluminum, 100 g of copper, 30 g of mercury, and 15 g of scandium using a precision scale. 
 2. In a well-ventilated area, combine the aluminum and copper in a crucible. 
 3. Slowly add the scandium to the mixture, ensuring even distribution. 
 4. Carefully add the mercury last, as it is hazardous. Stir the mixture gently to ensure a uniform blend.
